=======================================
Documentation for uza_bus_eq_rev_mi.csv
=======================================

File Structure
--------------
Each row is a an urbanized area.
Column names as follows:
UZAName: Name of urbanized area
MSACode: Code identifying the metropolitan area consistent with metropolitan area codes in the 2001 NHTS
BusEqRevMi: Annual bus-equivalent revenue miles of all urbanized area public transit service. See VETransportSupply for information on calculating revenue mile equivalents.
UZAPop: Urbanized area population
BusEqRevMiPC: Ratio of annual bus-equivalent revenue miles to urbanized area population.


Source:
-------
National Transit Database, https://www.transit.dot.gov/ntd
